title: Insurance Brokerage
description: I transformed an outdated brokerage insurance website into a modern, fully optimized React application. The project included a complete redesign, adding Egyptian Arabic language support to enhance user engagement, content reordering, introducing a new application section, improving navigation, optimizing for mobile, and achieving faster rendering for a seamless user experience.
